attributes.action: Replace Derek Twigg the veterans minister, and Tim Taylor SPVA Chief Executive with actual veterans.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Derek Twigg the so called veterans minister and Tim Taylor the Chief Exec of the SPVA allow those below them to treat War Disablement Pensioners and veterans like scum.

We ask that they be replaced with former senior officers from all three services to ensure we are treated fairly and with respect.
